title: Plume Latraverse collection 24CDs FLAC/MP3
description:
Plume Latraverse is a legendary icon in the Quebec counterculture. Unfortunately, most of his discography has not been made available digitally. Leaving many albums from his classic 70's/80's period to be forgotten by many. Here I have included almost all of his available CD albums in FLAC (except Livraison Par En Arriere because I couldn't find a physical copy). For the releases not available digitally I have included the best sounding MP3 versions I could find online. Enjoy & share!


FLAC Albums:

1975 Pommes de Route
1976 En Noir et Blanc
1978 All Dressed
1982 Metamorphoses, Tome I (Vinyl, 16-44)
1989 Le Lour Passe De Plume Latraverse Vol. I
1989 Le Lour Passe De Plume Latraverse Vol. II
1990 Chansons pour toutes sortes de monde
1990 Le Lour Passe De Plume Latraverse Vol. III
1992 Le Lour Passe De Plume Latraverse Vol. IV
1995 Le Lour Passe De Plume Latraverse Vol. V
1998 Mixed Grill
2001 VingTemps (Live)

2007 Hors Saisons
2008 Chansons Nouvelles
2008 Plumonymes
